testsuite.name: tests.shopping.TestCheckOutPage
testsuite.system-out: STEP - *** Running test method testSecureCheckOutForProducts... STEP - Launch Browser Successfully... STEP - Navigate to Casa39 English Website Home Page. STEP - Accepting Cookies... STEP - Search for a Available Product as Marazzi Evolutionmarble Calacatta 60x60 cm MHV2 STEP - Set - Marazzi Evolutionmarble Calacatta 60x60 cm MHV2 Selecting product from suggested item list... STEP - Click - Marazzi Evolutionmarble Calacatta 60x60 cm MHV2 Verified - Marazzi Evolutionmarble Calacatta 60x60 cm MHV2 as Searched Product is Correctly Displayed STEP - Select Quantity and add to cart STEP - Set - 30 STEP - Click - Add to Cart Verified - Marazzi Evolutionmarble Calacatta 60x60 cm MHV2 Verified - has been added to your cart STEP - Click - Continue STEP - Validate Non-Empty Cart and Close STEP - Click - My Cart €705.02 Verified - Item Prices are Correct Verified - Total Items are Correct STEP - View Shopping Cart STEP - Click - View and edit cart Validating '€705.02' from Summary... Verified - Sub Total is Correct Verified - Page Title is Displayed Validating '€150.00' from Summary... Verified - Shipping Price is Correct Validating '€158.09' from Summary... Verified - Tax Amount is Correct Validating '€989.16' from Summary... Verified - Order Total is Correct STEP - Proceed To Checkout STEP - Click - Proceed to Checkout Verified - Marazzi Evolutionmarble Calacatta 60x60 cm MHV2 is Displayed STEP - Closing Browser Successfully... STEP - *** Executed testSecureCheckOutForProducts test successfully...
